reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fun fairytale story!
reviews.reviewText: This is a great book. It’s easy to read and relax with. I read it in a couple days. I recommend it for any age group!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I really enjoy this genre. This book was a fun read I connected with the characters and enjoyed the plot . Finished it in one day

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This book was very creative and had a really interesting twist to everyday fairy tales. Each chapter kept me wanting to know what was next. I highly recommend this book. I enjoyed it as an adult and plan to give one to my granddaughter. I have read this author's trilogy, The Silver Eclipse and enjoyed those as well. I look forward to reading more books by her.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Delightful mix of fairytales and humor
reviews.reviewText: I devoured this in just three days and bought a copy for a friend. My kids are enjoying it, too!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Twisty Fairytale Maze
reviews.reviewText: "Our lives are like a movie. In our own story we are the main character. In other people's story we may be a supporting character or a background character. Everyone influences our lives to different extents, and so we need to decide how we want to be reflected in everyone else's story."Really enjoyed this twisty fairytale maze. In the beginning, Olivia is with her sister shopping for wedding dresses. She meets this nosy woman who ascertains Olivia doesnt believe in happily ever after. This is dulled by previous experiences.Next thing we know, Olivia falls out of this window (trying to get a cat) and lands in this story book world. Here she finds out each time she wakes up its a different fairytale. However, she must end the story correctly and see it through or she repeats it over till she gets it right. There are also other ways to skip to another story. Little does she know there is a guy named Jerron subjected to the same thing. Oh and the nosy woman is there too. There's also a helpful wolf and a evil prince. Do they ever get out? Find love? Readers will be awarded a whimsical voyage. This book is what dreams are made of.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is the kind of book you don’t want to put down. When I finished it I was sad it was over. The story was so good I wanted it to continue. Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Very creative. The characters were believable and relatable. Thoroughly enjoyed reading it. I would definitely recommend this book to anyone who enjoys reading.
